Title: Episode 198: Wil van der Aalst on Workflow Management Systems
Description: Recording Venue: WebEx Guest: Wil van der Aalst Robert Blumen interviews Professor Wil van der Aalst of the Technical University of Eindhoven, one of the world’s leading researchers in business process management and workflow systems.
